title: nyquist~
description: The `nyquist~` object reports the Nyquist frequency (half the audio sample rate) or its corresponding period. It outputs this value upon patch loading, when receiving a `bang`, or when the sample rate changes. Users can specify the output format as Hz, kHz, milliseconds, or seconds using flags like `-khz`, `-ms`, or `-sec`, and can also assign a `value` name to retrieve the output elsewhere.
